com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Class KLightProjectiveWithoutShadowDiffuseOnly

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.kernel.types.KLightProjectiveWithoutShadowDiffuseOnly
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KLightDiffuseOnlyType, KLightProjectiveType, KLightPropertiesType, KLightType, KLightWithTransformType, KTexturesRequiredType

    @EqualityReference
public final class KLightProjectiveWithoutShadowDiffuseOnly
extends Object
implements KLightProjectiveType, KLightDiffuseOnlyType

    A projective light without a shadow.

    The light will not cause specular highlights.
